{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = MG2.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = MG2 Cable Media Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.arris.com/products/mg2-cable-media-gateway/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_MG2 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = MG2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = set top box |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM7449S; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 3 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = <!-- true, --> |eth1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth3chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |eth4chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.4 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MoCA 2.0 Channel Bonding, HDMI, SPDIF out, CableCard, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Has a 1TB internal HDD and six digital video tuners supporting CableCard. :Also known as ''Arris DCX900''
===Specifications=== *[http://www.goamt.com/mg2-cable-media-gateway-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo ''ARRIS MG2'' on '''Advanced Media Technologies'''] :• [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/MG2_CABLE-MEDIA-GATEWAY-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Datasheet] *[https://technology.ihs.com/606985/teardown-arris-dcx900 ''Teardown - Arris DCX900''] on '''IHS''' :• Source of [[Broadcom]] BCM7449S CPU info
==See also== :;[http://www.goamt.com/mfrcatalog/arris-headend-digital-video-processing Arris DVP Products (AMT)] *[[Arris MG1]] (MoCA 2.0) • [http://www.goamt.com/mg1-whole-home-multi-tuner-video-gateway AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/MG1_MULTI-TUNER-VIDEO-GATEWAY_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris MG2]] (DCX900) • [http://www.goamt.com/mg2-cable-media-gateway-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/MG2_CABLE-MEDIA-GATEWAY-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[TiVo MG3-R]] • ''Network CableCard Tuner'' *[[TiVo MG3-OTA-H]] • ''Network OTA Tuner'' *[[Arris Mi3]] (IP, WiFi) • [http://www.goamt.com/mi3-ip-client-optional-wifi-module AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/MI3_IP-CLIENT-OPTIONAL-WIFI-MODULE_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris Mi4]] (IP900) • [http://www.goamt.com/mi4-cable-ip-client-atsc-hevc-uhd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/MI4_CABLE-IP-CLIENT-ATSC-HEVC-UHD-WITH-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.] *[[Arris Qi3]] (DCX860) • [http://www.goamt.com/qi3-cable-set-top-box-ip-client-atsc-avc-hd-moca-2.0-tivo AMT] • [http://www.goamt.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/QI3_CABLE-SET-TOP-BOX-IP-CLIENT-ATSC-AVC-HD-MOCA-2.0-TIVO_AMT.pdf Spec.]
